Euler characteristic curves¶

Contents:

euchar.curve.complex_2d()¶
euchar.curve.image_2d(image, max_intensity=256, vector_of_euler_changes_2d=[])¶

Euler characteristic curve of image.

image

list of lists of integers or two dimensional np.array

max_intensity

maximum value of any input of the form of image

vector_of_euler_changes_2d

list of integers, precomputed Euler characteristic changes produced by a single pixel insertion

euler_char_curve

list of integers
